sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Green Buildings Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Green Buildings Act.

sections.heading: Findings.
sections.text: The General Assembly finds that an efficient green building plan is essential to:

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
